item.description:
With such limited interest in the Revere Beach ride, I am changing the idea. I just learned that there is a European Motorcyle show at Larz Anderson Auto Museum in Brookline. I've included a link for details.

Ride there on your own to check out the bikes. The show ends at 4 and depending upon interest we can ride after and then maybe grab a bite. This park is on the Brookline/JP line so we can explore that area.

There is a $10 admission charge unless you happen to belong to the museum.

http://www.larzanders...
item.how_to_find_us: If you want to ride after the show, we can meet at 4pm in the parking lot of the museum
item.name: European Bike Show in Brookline
